body_html:
Hi, can I use this as a drop-in replacement for the normal way gradients are calculated?
The same way openai/gradient-checkpointing lets someone just overwrite tf.gradients?

Thanks.
body_text:
Hi, can I use this as a drop-in replacement for the normal way gradients are calculated?
The same way openai/gradient-checkpointing lets someone just overwrite tf.gradients?
Thanks.
body:
Hi, can I use this as a drop-in replacement for the normal way gradients are calculated?
The same way [openai/gradient-checkpointing](https://github.com/openai/gradient-checkpointing) lets someone just overwrite tf.gradients?

Thanks.
